posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
UMD can be useful for scrolls.  IIRC, 33 UMD will allow you to use all scrolls with no failure.

If you take 2 points off of CON, that would give you 4 points to spend, 2 on DEX for better AC, and 2 on CHA to help get that 33 UMD.  With the 13 DEX, Dodge would become an option for the extra feat at level 18.

I would shuffle some of the pre-epic feats.  Take Blind Fight at 6, Cleave at 14, and Toughness at 18.

If you take only 10 CoT, you could get 2 more Fighter to regain the lost feat, and 2 more Rogue for more skill points, more skill dumps, and slightly better sneaks.

It's quite good as it is,
as Empyre said, change the order of some of your pre-epic fets,
(WF before IE, BF earlier, Cleave after PA, Toughness last), and you are good to go.
If you are getting knocked-down relatively easy then SF: Disc will give you the equivalent of +6 Str.
